# Co-Planning Discussion: Inviting Guardian Feedback

## Introduction
As you embark on your project journey at Excel High School, collaboration with your guardian can provide valuable perspective and support. This guide will help you effectively invite your guardian to comment on your project scope through the Excel High School portal.

## Why Guardian Input Matters
Your guardian brings unique insights that can help strengthen your project planning. Their life experience and different viewpoint can help you identify potential challenges, refine your ideas, and consider aspects you might have overlooked.

## How to Invite Guardian Feedback
1. Log into your Excel High School student portal
2. Navigate to your current project workspace
3. Select the "Guardian Collaboration" option
4. Use the message template to personalize your invitation
5. Include specific questions about areas where you'd like feedback
6. Set a reasonable timeframe for their response

Remember to be open to their suggestions and use their input to enhance your project planning. This collaborative approach models real-world professional skills that will benefit you beyond Excel High School.
